building_easy.pre: Tap once on all tiles with at least one building.
building_easy.post_correct: Great. Swipe left and let's have a look a some more difficult examples.
building_easy.post_wrong: Oh no. Make sure to map all buildings. Swipe left to see more examples.

building_difficult.pre: Some buildings (e.g. huts) are more difficult to spot.
building_difficult.post_correct: Perfect. Always look for those details.
building_difficult.post_wrong: Take a closer look. There are some buildings here.

no_building_easy.pre: In many cases there will be no buildings. Just swipe left to map further.
no_building_easy.post_wrong: Be careful. We can't find any buildings here.

no_building_difficult.pre: Sometimes there are objects which look similar to buildings. Have a look at the surrounding.
no_building_difficult.post_wrong: No. There are no buildings in this area.

bad_clouds.pre: If you see clouds and no buildings tap three times.
bad_clouds.post_wrong: Oh no. Make sure to indicate clouds as well.

bad_no_imagery.pre: If imagery is lacking also tap three times.
bad_no_imagery.post_wrong: Please mark all tiles for which there is no imagery.
